screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .spx file in VideoLAN VLC media player 3.0.12
screenshot.caption: SPX file open in VideoLAN VLC media player 3.0.12

description: The Ogg Vorbis Speex format is developed by Xiph.Org. The Ogg Vorbis container format is utilized by several types of multimedia files, including .OGG and .OGX files.

In SPX files, the audio data stored in the Ogg Vorbis container is encoded with the open-source Speex codec. Speex supports intensity stereo encoding, noise suppression, echo cancellation, variable bitrate (VBR) encoding, Voice Activity Detection (VAD), and Discontinuous Transmission (DTX).
